name: 2MD: VR Football
description:
2MD is a groundbreaking motion-controlled VR football game. Draw the plays, call the shots, and throw, hand-off, or run the ball before the clock runs out!

● Throw like a pro with realistic motion controls in the first football game of its kind for PlayStation®VR.

● Draw plays and hone your strategy: customize up to 8 offensive plays in VR before taking the field.

● Featuring 8 unique teams. Customize colors, QB voice, route color, and fight song.

● Hit the field in 8 immersive stadiums filled with thousands of screaming fans and larger-than-life TD celebrations.

● Call the shots on the field using digital commands or voice control.

● Exciting arcade presentation featuring a 7-round heat with rapid-fire bonus rounds that can massively increase your endgame score.

● PlayStation®4 Pro support: 8x AA, higher texture fidelity, increased shadow detail and faster loading.

● The list goes on: spectacular replayability, challenging AI, Platinum Trophy support, leaderboards, unlockables, & more!

1 player
PlayStation®VR Required
PlayStation®Camera Required
2 PS®Move controllers required
